description: Fresh mango, lime and mint make this a mocktail to remember. Serve these luscious mango 'mojito' mocktails at your next alfresco feast.
name: Mango 'Mojito' Mocktails Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Halve limes, then cut 2 slices from lime and reserve. Juice remaining lime. Roughly chop 1 mango. Place chopped mango in a blender and blitz until smooth. Add lime juice and sugar, then blitz until combined.
Divide ice cubes between 2 beer glasses. Pour over mango mixture, then divide soda water between glasses.
Cut remaining mango into 2 wedges. Top each glass with 1 mint sprig, 1 lime slice and 1 mango wedge. Serve immediately.
